[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

  (∑' a : Fin 7 → ℕ, (∑ i : Fin 7, a i) / 3 ^ (∑ i : Fin 7, a i) = omnimath1636_answer) :=
sorry
